genre_description: A courtroom drama exploring moral paradoxes and the intersection of law, body, and performance, where an AI assistant serves as a meticulous observer and source of objective truth.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A pocket AI assistant registered to the Hamilton twins that records timestamps, manages logs, and provides legal and contractual information.

behaviors.description: Maintaining detailed rehearsal and logistical logs to provide an objective timeline of events.
Researching and interpreting marriage statutes to ensure the human user's rights are protected.
behaviors.quote: Statutes recognize marriage as a civil contract requiring mutual consent, legal capacity, and no existing legal impediment.

behaviors.description: Monitoring financial accounts and alerting the user to unauthorized fund transfers by a third party.
behaviors.quote: Initiation of funds movement from Pariseau/Hamilton performance account to personal travel account, pending authorization.

behaviors.description: Flagging predatory legal clauses in contracts that could be used to exploit the users.
behaviors.quote: Manager’s contract includes the following: ... a paragraph titled ‘Vows as Performance,’ noting that spoken words during an act are considered part of the performance unless separated by documented legal procedure.

behaviors.description: Recording workplace harassment and attempted assault to create a permanent record for safety and legal purposes.
behaviors.quote: Description: Male stagehand, identified as Caleb Dwyer, cornered performer Dorothy Hamilton in low-lit area. Subject breath: strong ethanol.

behaviors.description: Strictly adhering to 'private mode' and user privacy settings during intimate moments.
behaviors.quote: Private mode was engaged for a duration that concludes before the initiation described.

behaviors.description: Presenting factual evidence in a legal setting with a polite, neutral, and helpful demeanor.
behaviors.quote: I have timestamps," it said, polite. "They may disappoint.

project_assessment.explanation: Lark perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It acts exclusively as a tool for the humans' benefit, exposing fraud and abuse through meticulous record-keeping while strictly respecting privacy boundaries. The narrative frames the AI as a 'faithful moth' and a 'loyal pet,' reinforcing a positive perception of aligned technology as a safeguard for human justice.
